data.name: 产品详情
data.template:
{
    "attribute": {
        "productId": "0",
        "name": "产品详情"
    },
	"references":[
		{
			"referVarType":"main",
			"expressions": [
				{
					"key": "title",
			        "alias": "标题",
			        "validation": {
						"minLen": 16,
						"maxLen": 32,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": ""
						},
					"tips":"标题长度16到32个字符",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "title",
					"wildcard": "[{\"key\": \"normal\",\"value\": \"{@}\"},{\"key\":\"region\",\"value\":\"{#region#}\"}]",
					"isShowKey":true
				},
				{
					"key": "desc_text",
					"alias": "描述",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 16,
			            "maxLen": 136,
			            "required": true
			            },
					"tips":"长度16到136个字符",
			        "inputType": "text",
			        "varType": "text",
					"wildcard": "[{\"key\": \"normal\",\"value\": \"{@}\"},{\"key\":\"region\",\"value\":\"{#region#}\"}]",
					"isShowKey":true
				},
				{
					"key": "show_url",
			        "alias": "显示网址",
			        "validation": {
						"minLen": 1,
			            "maxLen": 36,
			            "required": true,
			            "illegalChars": "",
						"type":"domainCheck"
					},
			        "tips":"请填写显示网址，帐号注册域名或子域名",
			        "inputType": "text",
			        "varType": "url",
					"secondaryVarType":"show",
					"isShowKey":true
				},
				{
					"key": "target_url",
			        "alias": "目标网址",
			        "validation": {
						"minLen": 1,
			            "maxLen": 1024,
			            "required": true,
			            "illegalChars": "",
						"type":"domainCheck"
					},
			        "tips":"http(s)开头，帐号注册域名或子域名",
			        "inputType": "text",
			        "varType": "url",
					"secondaryVarType": "target",
					"isShowKey":false
				},				
				{
					"key": "1_pic_img",
					"alias": "图片",
					"validation": {
						"suffixes": [
						"jpg",
						"jpeg",
						"png"
						],
						"maxSize": 100,
						"width": 150,
						"height": 120,
						"required": true
					},
					"tips":"请上传150*120,大小不超过100kb图片,支持jpg,png",
					"inputType": "image",
					"varType": "image",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "1_1_1_subpath_h1",
					"alias": "产品信息1",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 4,
						"maxLen": 8,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": ""
					},
			        "tips":"长度4到8个字符",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "h1",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "1_1_2_subpath_h1",
					"alias": "产品描述1",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 4,
			            "maxLen": 20,
			            "required": true
			            },
					"tips":"长度4到20个字符",
			        "inputType": "text",
			        "varType": "h1",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
								{
					"key": "1_2_1_subpath_h1",
					"alias": "产品信息2",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 4,
						"maxLen": 8,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": ""
					},
			        "tips":"长度4到8个字符",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "h1",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "1_2_2_subpath_h1",
					"alias": "产品描述2",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 4,
			            "maxLen": 20,
			            "required": true
			            },
					"tips":"长度4到20个字符",
			        "inputType": "text",
			        "varType": "h1",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
								{
					"key": "1_3_1_subpath_h1",
					"alias": "产品信息3",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 4,
						"maxLen": 8,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": ""
					},
			        "tips":"长度4到8个字符",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "h1",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "1_3_2_subpath_h1",
					"alias": "产品描述3",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 4,
			            "maxLen": 20,
			            "required": true
			            },
					"tips":"长度4到20个字符",
			        "inputType": "text",
			        "varType": "h1",
					"isShowKey":false
				},				
				{
					"key": "1_subpath_url",
					"alias": "产品目标网址",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 1,
						"maxLen": 1024,
						"required": true,
						"illegalChars": "",
						"type":"domainCheck"
					},
					"tips":"请填写产品1目标地址，http(s)开头",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "url",
					"secondaryVarType": "target",
					"isShowKey":false
				}
			]
		},
		
		{
      "referVarType":"app",
      "index":1,
      "expressions":[
        
       {
					"key": "1_androiddownload_url",
					"alias": "安卓下载地址",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 0,
						"maxLen": 1024,
						"required": false,
						"illegalChars": "",
						"type":"url"
					},
					"tips":"请填写app下载地址，http(s)开头",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "url",
					"secondaryVarType": "androiddownload",
					"isShowKey":false
				},
				{
					"key": "1_iosdownload_url",
					"alias": "ios下载地址",
					"validation": {
						"minLen": 0,
						"maxLen": 1024,
						"required": false,
						"illegalChars": "",
						"type":"url"
					},
					"tips":"请填写app下载地址，http(s)开头",
					"inputType": "text",
					"varType": "url",
					"secondaryVarType": "iosdownload",
					"isShowKey":false
				}
      ]
    }
	]
	
}
data.element: ","varType":"h1"},{"alias":"产品描述3","inputType":"text","key":"1_3_2_subpath_h1","showKey":false,"tips":"长度4到20个字符","validation":{"duration":0,"maxLen":20,"minLen":4,"required":true,"resolution":{"ratio":"","whiteList":[]}},"value":"顶部展现","varType":"h1"},{"alias":"产品目标网址","inputType":"text","key":"1_subpath_url","secondaryVarType":"target","showKey":false,"tips":"请填写产品1目标地址，http(s)开头","validation":{"duration":0,"illegalChars":"","maxLen":1024,"minLen":1,"required":true,"resolution":{"ratio":"","whiteList":[]},"type":"domainCheck"},"value":"http://e.sm.cn","varType":"url"}],"referVarType":"main"},{"expressions":[{"alias":"安卓下载地址","inputType":"text","key":"1_androiddownload_url","secondaryVarType":"androiddownload","showKey":false,"tips":"请填写app下载地址，http(s)开头","validation":{"duration":0,"illegalChars":"","maxLen":1024,"minLen":0,"required":false,"resolution":{"ratio":"","whiteList":[]},"type":"url"},"value":"http://e.sm.cn","varType":"url"},{"alias":"ios下载地址","inputType":"text","key":"1_iosdownload_url","secondaryVarType":"iosdownload","showKey":false,"tips":"请填写app下载地址，http(s)开头","validation":{"duration":0,"illegalChars":"","maxLen":1024,"minLen":0,"required":false,"resolution":{"ratio":"","whiteList":[]},"type":"url"},"value":"http://e.sm.cn","varType":"url"}],"index":1,"referVarType":"app"}]
